bibl.title: Letter from Ida E. and John R. Kissinger to Emilie Lawrence Reed, October 17, 1927

div1.p: The Kissingers thank Emilie Lawrence Reed for inviting them to the Belroi dedication.

div1.head: Letter from Ida E. and John R. Kissinger to Emilie Lawrence Reed, October 17, 1927
div1.opener:
Oct 17 - 27. Kissingers Dream Home
Huntington
Ind.
R. R. 8.
Mrs Walter Reed
div1.p:
My Dear Mrs Reed Just
a few lines to let you know
we received your memorial
card; and to say to you.
We were with, you in mind
and in Spirit on that Memorial
day if not in Person.

as you know It was Impossible for
us to be there we Thank you for
remembering us,

Mr Kissinger some days feels
Very bad. but he is Surely
Happy in our new home its
a wonderful place; We love
It. We do wish at some time
you would come and vissit
us

We are Trying to fix up
for winter now Its been
rather cool for a few
days.

Mr Kissinger Says to
Tell you. that the picture
you sent us has the best
spot on our walls; and It
lovely. We are very proud
of It. We hope to hear from
you again

closer.signed: Mr and Mrs John R Kissinger
